brand wool ease worsted weight 80% acrylic/20% wool approx 70 g/3 oz 180 m/197 yds color chocolate brown h 5 00 mm hook tapestry needle finished size fits an average woman s 20 50 5 cm head circumference if you would like to make a smaller size replace round 6 with instructions for round 8 length of hat from center to bottom shell edge is 7 1/2 if you would like to shorten hat remove rounds 15 and 16 pattern chain 2 work 8 double_crochet into the 2nd chain from the hook join with slip_stitch to first double_crochet rrrroooouuuunnnndddd 1111 chain 1 single_crochet in first
